page.title: 07Games We Play
page.content: These are some of the games we play at home and on the school playground.{ {Square Ball,Tig,Stag,Stoolball,British {Bulldog,Rounders,Orange {Balls,Stuck-in-the-Mud}and{Red Rover. This is how to play{Stuck-in-the-Mud. There is a person on,he has to tag (touch) another person.The person who has been tug has to stand like a scarecrow with his legs open.Another person who has not been tug can go under their legs to free them.When you have been 'tug' three times you are on. This is how to play{Red Rover.}You have an equal number of people on each side.Each side holds hands and one side calls a person from the other side.The person chosen runs and tries to break the opposing chain.If he does not break the chain by a count of ten he then joins that side.
